name: unbound-cloud-client
author: Skeli789
description: Unbound Cloud is a tool to add extra storage for ROM Hacks.

scripts.package-win32: cross-env PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=ia32 ICON=ico yarn package
scripts.package-win64: cross-env PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=x64 ICON=ico yarn package
scripts.package-winarm64: cross-env PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=arm64 ICON=ico yarn package
scripts.package-linux32: cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=ia32 ICON=png yarn package
scripts.package-linux64: cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=x64 ICON=png yarn package
scripts.package-linuxarmv7l: cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=armv7l ICON=png yarn package
scripts.package-linuxarm64: cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=arm64 ICON=png yarn package
scripts.package-linuxmips64el: cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=mips64el ICON=png yarn package
scripts.package-mac64: cross-env PLATFORM=darwin ARCH=x64 ICON=icns yarn package
scripts.package-macarm64: cross-env PLATFORM=darwin ARCH=arm64 ICON=icns yarn package
scripts.package-macuniversal: cross-env PLATFORM=darwin ARCH=universal ICON=icns yarn package
